review.reviewBody: It was great how I was able to substitute two ingredients for two ingredients I prefered at no extra cost. Peaceful is not greasy and a great price. Youve gotta try it if youve never been. I recommend any of the hand pulled noodle stir frys or the chicken dumplings with the soup in the middle!

I normally don't write reviews on here but WOW this peaceful location is soo good. I got the vegetarian dan Dan-Dan Noodles | 擔擔麵 Pan-Fried Chicken Dumplings | 雞肉鍋貼 and Xiao-Long Bao Steamed Buns | 小龙包 and wow the quality is so good. I haven't had the best luck with consistency at other locations but ordered this 3x now and always good
excellent Dan Dan noodles!  And I love the Peaceful Potato Rolls | 土豆絲卷餅   10/10!

We really enjoyed our food! My boyfriend's  favourite was the Sweet & Sour Chicken | 咕嚕雞球 and mine was the Spicy Gingered Beef | 干煸牛肉絲. The Chicken Stir-Fried Noodles| 雞肉炒麵 had thicker sized noodles (kinda like Udon) and we really enjoyed that, as well :) thank you!

the "marbled pork" was disgusting , did not look at all like the picture. the portions are now half the size since the last time i ordered. they got new tiny containers. too bad, use to be a great place. wont be ordering here again.
